vocabulary.title: Vocabulary
vocabulary.conceptPlaceholder: Core idea or concept behind the word...
vocabulary.noCollectionsWarning: Please create a collection first before adding words

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this word?

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app
settings.sm2Description: Dynamic intervals based on performance. Best for advanced learners.
settings.modifiedSm2Description: Fixed intervals per box. Predictable and easy to understand.
settings.simpleDescription: Doubles interval each time. Great for beginners.
settings.consecutiveCorrectDescription: How many correct answers needed to move to next box
settings.showFailedWordsDescription: Retry incorrect words immediately in the same session
settings.autoAdvanceTimeoutDescription: Time before automatically showing next question
settings.showHintInFillWord: Show Hint in Fill Word Mode
settings.showHintInFillWordDescription: Display the first letter as a hint when filling words

practice.title: Practice
practice.selectModeDescription: Choose how you want to practice your vocabulary
practice.selectCollectionDescription: Choose which collection you want to practice
practice.noCollectionsDescription: Create a collection first to start practicing
practice.batchSizeDescription: Choose how many words you want to practice in each session
practice.flashcardDescription: Flip cards to test your memory
practice.fillWordDescription: Type the correct word based on the definition
practice.multipleChoiceDescription: Choose the correct definition from options

study.title: Study Mode
study.bannerDescription: Practice freely without affecting your learning statistics
study.selectModeDescription: Choose how you want to study
study.practiceWithoutTracking: Practice all words without tracking progress

auth.loginDescription: Sign in to your account to continue learning
auth.registerDescription: Create an account to start your language journey
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
auth.oauthNotConfigured: Google OAuth is not configured. Please set VITE_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID in your .env file.

gdrive.title: Google Drive Sync
gdrive.signInDescription: Sign in with your Google account to automatically sync your database to Google Drive.
gdrive.scopeDescription: This will request access to create and manage files in your Google Drive (drive.file scope).
gdrive.lastSyncInfo: Last sync info will appear above after successful backup
gdrive.confirmBackup: Backup your database to Google Drive?
gdrive.confirmRestore: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: This will replace your current data with the backup from Google Drive. Continue?
gdrive.restartPrompt: Please restart the application to see the restored data.

database.clearDatabaseWarning: This will permanently delete all your local data including collections, vocabularies, and practice history. Make sure you have a backup on Google Drive before proceeding. The database will be cleared immediately and you can start fresh or restore from backup.
database.dangerZoneWarning:
üö® DANGER: This will PERMANENTLY DELETE all local data!

This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have a backup on Google Drive before proceeding.

Are you absolutely sure?
database.finalConfirmation: Final confirmation: Delete all local data?

collections.title: Collections
collections.name: Collection Name
collections.noCollectionsDescription: Create a collection to organize your vocabulary words
collections.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
collections.shareDescription: Enter the username of the person you want to share this collection with
collections.notSharedYet: This collection is not shared with anyone yet

csv.importDescription: Import vocabulary words from a CSV file into your collections
csv.exportDescription: Export your collections and vocabularies to a CSV file
csv.targetCollectionHelp: Leave empty to use collection names from CSV file
csv.autoCreateCollectionsHelp: If enabled, new collections will be created from CSV data when they don't exist
csv.noCollectionsSelected: Please select at least one collection to export
csv.noFileSelected: Please select a CSV file to import
csv.noCollectionsToExport: You don't have any collections to export yet
csv.templateDownloaded: CSV template downloaded successfully! Open it to see the correct format with examples.
csv.pasteHelp: Paste your CSV content here. Make sure it includes the header row with column names.
csv.noCsvText: Please paste CSV content or switch to file upload mode
csv.defaultLanguageHelp: This language will be used for new collections created during import
